files.description: The sole EHI export documentation — a 15-page PDF describing the C-CDA XML export format with 18 clinical data sections, each showing UI screenshots and XML element examples with sample data. Created 2023-05-10.

68-page SMART on FHIR API documentation for the (g)(10) FHIR API — separate from the (b)(10) EHI export. Documents OAuth2/SMART App Launch and FHIR R4 resource access for standard US Core resources. Downloaded for context.
CSV listing FHIR server and authentication server endpoints (test and production). Related to (g)(10) API, not (b)(10) export. Downloaded for completeness.

Full-page screenshot of the certification documentation page showing the page layout, all sections (Costs, Real World Testing, SAML, Additional Certification Documentation), and the EHI Export link at the bottom.
